posts.title: Omicron effect: India puts its plan of resuming international flights on 15 December on hold
posts.desc: Scheduled international flights have remained suspended in India since 23 March last year due to the COVID-19 pandemic

posts.title: Petrol price in Delhi to get cheaper by Rs 8 per litre as govt slashes VAT to 19.40%
posts.desc: The decision was taken in a meeting of the Delhi cabinet chaired by Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Wednesday

posts.title: Winter Session of Parliament: Allow people to express their views, says Shashi Tharoor as Opposition MPs protest against suspension
posts.desc: Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha had to be adjourned as the Opposition and Centre have locked horns after the suspension of the 12 members

posts.title: IPL 2022 Retained Players List: CSK bank on sustainable group of players; SRH leaving Rashid Khan out a massive missed opportunity
posts.desc: As everybody starts regaining their breath and making sense of the reality that lies ahead, the time seems ripe to delve into a deeper analysis of where these IPL teams floundered and the decisions they got right.

posts.title: Kamal Haasan fully recovered from COVID-19, fit to resume work from 4 Dec, says hospital
posts.desc: On 22 November, Haasan had said that he has tested positive for COVID-19 and he was admitted to SRMC Hospital the same day

posts.title: India vs New Zealand: Will take a call closer to game, says Mhambrey on Saha's availability
posts.desc: Stiffness in the neck did not allow India wicketkeeper Wriddhiman Saha to take the field on day five of the first Test. KS Bharat, who could make his debut on Friday, kept the wickets in his absence.

posts.title: CNN suspends Chris Cuomo 'indefinitely' over helping brother and ex-NY guv Andrew Cuomo in sex scandal
posts.desc: The news channel said in a statement the suspension of the primetime anchor followed the release of new court documents on Monday revealing how he helped his brother and former governor of New York combat allegations of sexual misconduct

posts.title: Omicron variant: Last thing we need is panic and over-reaction, says top South African epidemiologist
posts.desc: Prof Salim Abdool-Kariman was reacting to the international travel ban imposed on South Africa and its neighbouring nations by about 20 countries.

posts.title: India saw 168 very heavy rainfall events in November, highest in five years, says IMD
posts.desc: The weather department also said that the country received 56.5 mm of rainfall against the normal of 30.5 mm — an excess of 85.4 percent in the previous month

posts.title: India vs New Zealand: Hosts face welcome dilemma with return of skipper Virat Kohli
posts.desc: Shreyas Iyer's 105 and 65 in his debut Test, which ended in a draw in Kanpur against the Black Caps, has made it tough for Indian selectors to decide on their final XI.

posts.title: IPL 2022: Against BCCI guidelines if KL Rahul has been approached by other franchises, says Punjab Kings'
posts.desc: Rahul had replaced R Ashwin as captain ahead of the 2020 season and though he did excel with the bat, he failed to take the team to play-offs.

posts.title: Israel's Tel Aviv overtakes Paris to become world's most expensive city
posts.desc: Paris and Singapore came joint second, followed by Zurich and Hong Kong, according to the survey compiled by the Economist Intelligence Unit

posts.title: GST collection at Rs 1.31 lakh crore in November, second highest since rollout
posts.desc: The GST revenues for the month of November 2021, are 25 per cent higher than November 2020, and 27 per cent higher over November 2019

posts.title: Katrina Kaif-Vicky Kaushal wedding: Guests asked to sign NDA clause; check full SOPs
posts.desc: Vicky Kaushal and Katrina Kaif have set SOPs for their guest. Check details here:

posts.title: Ashes 2021-22: England spinner Jack Leach looks to 'impressive' Nathan Lyon for inspiration
posts.desc: Leach also spotlighted Ravindra Jadeja as an inspiration after the Indian's exploits during a Test series in Australia last summer.

posts.title: US expresses concern over rights abuses in Afghanistan at Doha meet, asks Taliban to take necessary steps
posts.desc: The meeting comes at a time when humanitarian crises are looming in Afghanistan and the economy of the Taliban-led country is on the brink of collapse

posts.title: Saina Nehwal to give World Championships a miss for the first time as injuries derail star shuttler's season
posts.desc: Nehwal, who has won a silver and bronze besides eight quarter-final finishes in the World Championships over the years, is recovering from a groin pull and knee injury.

posts.title: Bombay HC grants default bail to activist Sudha Bharadwaj in Bhima Koregaon case
posts.desc: Bharadwaj has been in custody as an undertrial since her arrest in 2018. The high court, however, rejected the default bail pleas of co-accused Sudhir Dhawale and 7 others.

posts.title: Narendra Modi to visit Dehradun on 4 December, lay foundation stone of projects worth Rs 18,000 crore
posts.desc: The prime minister will launch 11 development projects, including the government's ambitious project — the Delhi-Dehradun Economic Corridor (from Eastern Peripheral Expressway Junction to Dehradun)

posts.title: November sees lowest number of new COVID-19 cases in India since May, 2020
posts.desc: The daily rise in the number of new coronavirus cases has been below 20,000 for 54 straight days and less than 50,000 daily new cases have been reported for 156 consecutive days now.
